devdoc.details: Deployer contract for ERC20 transformers.      Only authorities may call `deploy()` and `kill()`.

Deployed(address,uint256,address).details: Emitted when a contract is deployed via `deploy()`.

params.deployedAddress: The address of the deployed contract.

Killed(address,address).details: Emitted when a contract is killed via `kill()`.

params.target: The address of the contract being killed..

constructor.details: Create this contract and register authorities.

deploy(bytes).details: Deploy a new contract. Only callable by an authority.      Any attached ETH will also be forwarded.

kill(address,address).details: Call `die()` on a contract. Only callable by an authority.

params.ethRecipient: The Recipient of any ETH locked in `target`.
params.target: The target contract to call `die()` on.

params.index: Index of target in authorities array.

transferOwnership(address).details: Change the owner of this contract.
